15-year-old.context: Adenotonsillectomy. Recurrent tonsillitis. The adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied.

adenoid bed.context: The adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied.

hypertrophied.context: The adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied.

adenoid curettes.context: Adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.

packs.context: Adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.

right tonsil.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

gold laser.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

contralateral tonsil.context: A similar procedure was performed on the contralateral tonsil.

hemostasis.context: Following meticulous hemostasis, saline was used to irrigate and no further bleeding noted.

saline.context: Following meticulous hemostasis, saline was used to irrigate and no further bleeding noted.

bleeding.context: Following meticulous hemostasis, saline was used to irrigate and no further bleeding noted.

McIvor mouthgag.context: The patient was brought to the operating room and, under general endotracheal anesthesia in supine position, the table turned and a McIvor mouthgag placed.

supine position.context: The patient was brought to the operating room and, under general endotracheal anesthesia in supine position, the table turned and a McIvor mouthgag placed.

table turned.context: The patient was brought to the operating room and, under general endotracheal anesthesia in supine position, the table turned and a McIvor mouthgag placed.

Floxin drops.context: If there is any ear drainage, please use the Floxin drops.
